verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord's my Shepherd
I'll not want
He makes me down to lie
In pastures green
He leadeth me
The quiet waters by

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My soul He doth
Restore again
And me to walk
Doth make
Within the paths
Of righteousness
E'en for His
Own name's sake

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yea though I walk
In death's dark vale
Yet will I fear no ill
For Thou art with me
And Thy rod
And staff me
Comfort still

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My table Thou
Hast furnished
In presence of
My foes
My head Thou dost
With oil annoint
And my cup overflows

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Goodness and mercy
All my life
Shall surely follow me
And in God's house
Forevermore
My dwelling place shall be
